name: CL_LAR_ID
description: This contains the Master Patient Index (MPI) ID table items for Research Study Enrollment Information records.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the enrollment record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The ID type for this research study's Master Patient Index (MPI) ID.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_ID
columns.description: The external Master patient Index (MPI) ID for this research study.

columns.name: MPI_FROM_DATE
columns.description: Date the ID is effective from for the research study.

columns.name: MPI_TO_DATE
columns.description: Date the ID is effective to for the research study.
